HandBrake's settings for the AppleTV, including Dolby Digital 5.1 AC3 sound. Provides a good balance between quality and file size, and optimizes performance.
HandBrake's settings maxed out for slowest encoding and highest quality. Use at your own risk. So slow it's not just insane...it's a trip to the looney bin.
HandBrake's preset for impatient people who don't care about picture quality.
HandBrake's preset for people without a lot of money to waste on hard drives. Tries to maximize quality for burning to CDs, so you can party like it's 1999.
HandBrake's preset for consistently excellent quality in one pass, with the downside of entirely unpredictable file sizes and bitrates.

HandBrake's preset for true high profile x264 quality. A good balance of quality and speed, based on community standards found in the wild. This preset will give you a much better sense of x264's capabilities than vanilla main profile.
HandBrake's settings for the Sony PlayStation 3.
HandBrake's settings for the Sony PlayStation Portable.
HandBrake's high quality settings for use with QuickTime. It can be slow, so use it when the Normal preset doesn't look good enough.
HandBrake's settings for video from television.
HandBrake's settings for the Microsoft Xbox 360.
HandBrake's settings for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
HandBrake's high resolution settings for the iPod. Good video quality, great for viewing on a TV using your iPod
HandBrake's low resolution settings for the iPod. Optimized for great playback on the iPod screen, with smaller file size.
